title: Employers recognized for supporting students (Kwantlen Polytechnic University)
text: ( Source : Kwantlen Polytechnic University ) Metro Vancouver , B.C. - Did you know that 85 per cent of co-op students continue on with their employers post-graduation? It's an excellent way to increase job prospects, build relationships within
